mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_BOARD ( IDX , TITLE , CONTENTS , COUNT , WRITER , INDATE) VALUES ( NULL , #{title, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{contents, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{count, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{writer, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , SYSDATE() )
mapper.select: SELECT A.IDX as idx , A.TITLE as title , A.CONTENTS as contents , IFNULL(A.COUNT,0) as count , A.WRITER as writer , A.INDATE as indate , B.NAME as writerName FROM TB_BOARD A LEFT JOIN TB_USR B ON A.WRITER =B.ID WHERE A.IDX=#{idx}

SELECT A.IDX as idx , A.TITLE as title , A.CONTENTS as contents , IFNULL(A.COUNT,0) as count , A.WRITER as writer , A.INDATE as indate , B.NAME as writerName ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_REPLAY X WHERE X.IDX = A.IDX) as reply ,(SELECT Y.FILENAME FROM TB_ATTACH Y WHERE Y.IDX = A.IDX AND Y.SEQ=1) AS filename FROM TB_BOARD A LEFT JOIN TB_USR B ON A.WRITER =B.ID WHERE 1=1
AND (A.TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') OR A.CONTENTS LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') )
ORDER BY A.IDX DESC
LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM TB_BOARD A WHERE 1=1
AND (A.TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') OR A.CONTENTS LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_REPLY ( IDX , SEQ , REPLY , WRITER , INDATE) VALUES ( #{idx} , (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(X.SEQ)+1,1) FROM TB_REPLY X WHERE X.IDX =#{idx}) , #{reply, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{writer, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , SYSDATE() )
mapper.select: SELECT A.IDX as idx , A.SEQ as seq , A.REPLY as reply , A.WRITER as writer , A.INDATE as indate FROM TB_REPLY A WHERE 1=1 AND A.IDX=#{idx} ORDER BY A.SEQ ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_ATTACH ( IDX , SEQ , FILENAME , WRITER , INDATE) VALUES ( #{idx} , (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(X.SEQ)+1,1) FROM TB_REPLY X WHERE X.IDX =#{idx}) , #{filename, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{writer, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , SYSDATE() )
mapper.select: SELECT A.IDX as idx , A.SEQ as seq , A.FILENAME as filename , A.WRITER as writer , A.INDATE as indate FROM TB_REPLY A WHERE 1=1 AND A.IDX=#{idx} AND A.SEQ=1 ORDER BY A.SEQ ASC
